name: about:blank system colours + notice
description: Colours empty blank page in system palette *1 and adds "≈ about:blank ≈" message there.
additional_info:
Variation, I just wanted to have some info text there.

Using :empty pseudoselector, so this should not affect about:blanks altered by userscripts nad extensions.

*1: works on Windows platform, on Linux uses some useless hardcoded palette (afaik).
